title: Kreyskull - Tower Witch  mp3 (2014)
description:
Haling from Finland, these guys wrote on their Myspace page that they are influenced by BLACK SABBATH, JUDAS PRIEST, PENTAGRAM, SAINT VITUS, RAINBOW, CANDLEMASS, all are some of the oldest heavy cannons of Metal,.
Finding  info about the band is pretty difficult, hence there's little backing information for this release or, indeed for the band.
KREYSKULL have found a pretty nice niche by fusing Doom Metal with good ol' fashioned 70's Rock and elements of Heavy Metal from the late 70's early 80's
Kreyskull a "heavy rock'n doom" band from the south-east parts of Finland, featuring ex-members from Demonic Death Judge, Kaihoro, and Total Devastation.
The band's sophomore album "Tower Witch" will be released October 3rd via Inverse Records, and a label spokesman comments:
"Kreyskull blends their riff-heavy doom grooviness with influences from the classic era 70's heavy metal and prog rock, even flirting with occasional jazz and psychedelia. With strong vocal performance, screaming lead guitars and bombastic rhythm section, they create their own unique style of heavy rock."
